How large is a piece of Malware?
https://nakedsecurity.sophos.com/2010/07/27/large-piece-malware/


Troj/JSRedir-BV is an obfuscated Javascript, typically seen attached to spam email messages.
Typically 3 kB to 5 kB in size.

Mal/Dloadr-Y is a downloading Trojan with functionality to change firewall settings.
Typically 25 kB to 30 kB in size.

FakeAV Trojans are rogue anti-virus applications that display fake infection warnings to try and scare users into paying for cleanup.
Range from about 300 kB to over 1 MB.

Viruses, although often relatively small in themselves, can infect legitimate applications of any size. For example, a typical variant of W32/Scribble-B contains about 20 kB of viral code, but infected applications can be just a few kilobytes or many megabytes in size.

W32/Scribble-B also injects a malicious iframe into htm, php and asp files. The iframe is just one line of html (about 80 bytes) but the infected web pages can be of any size.

replies.msg:
Unless someone is specifically targeting your network, the goal of virus writer is to get as many victims as they can. This means they typically send out their payload to millions. If the the file size is 2MB sending out 2 million messages will cost them 2TB of network traffic. Personally, I have never seen a virus more than a few KB. Therefore, you have to pick a number that is small enough for practical purposes and big enough to catch 99.999% of the viruses.
http://community.spiceworks.com/topic/2102406-average-size-of-a-virus-malware
即係要越細越好

Range from about 300 kB to over 1 MB.

Viruses, although often relatively small in themselves, can infect legitimate applications of any size. For example, a typical variant of W32/Scribble-B contains about 20 kB of viral code, but infected applications can be just a few kilobytes or many megabytes in size.

W32/Scribble-B also injects a malicious iframe into htm, php and asp files. The iframe is just one line of html (about 80 bytes) but the infected web pages can be of any size.

replies.msg:
下面我們來推算人類大腦存儲容量的數據大小。1000億個神經元即使只用十分之一，也有高達100億個神經元在使用。而小白鼠13個神經元系統就用了1TB的數據，那麼人類大腦存儲容量相當於7.6億TB的數據。即使用當前最高達8TB硬盤來存儲這些數據，也需要9500塊這樣的硬盤。

藍蛆真係慘 小白鼠都多過佢地

quote.msg: 佢個腦唔夠12mb

下面我們來推算人類大腦存儲容量的數據大小。1000億個神經元即使只用十分之一，也有高達100億個神經元在使用。而小白鼠13個神經元系統就用了1TB的數據，那麼人類大腦存儲容量相當於7.6億TB的數據。即使用當前最高達8TB硬盤來存儲這些數據，也需要9500塊這樣的硬盤。

藍蛆真係慘 小白鼠都多過佢地

replies.msg: 一個文字檔（*.txt）使用UTF-32格，它需要寫入約3百萬個中文字才能達到12MB大小。根據網上資料，新舊約全書的聖經有約78萬個中文字。依你所說，街邊隨便一個路人應該可以記下聖經新舊約全書的完整內容。
